plot: Andrey is a handsome veterinarian with a successful Moscow pet clinic. Popular with the ladies among his upscale clientele, he is forced to leave town when the jealous husband of one of them hires a hitman.
title: All Inclusive ili Vsyo vklyucheno!
plot_es: Andrey is a handsome veterinarian with a successful Moscow pet clinic. Popular with the ladies among his upscale clientele, he is forced to leave town when the jealous husband of one of them hires a hitman.
